definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
(of a liquid or gas) to leak/to divulge (a secret)/to leak
to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
to miss/to leave out/to omit/to be omitted/to be missing/to slip through/to leak out/to seep away
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
lit. not one drop of water can leak out/watertight/rigorous (argument)

sentences.english: Results Cerebrospinal rhinorrhea 14 from ethmoid sinus, 2 from sphenoid sinus.
sentences.chinese: 結果腦脊液漏14例位於篩竇，2例位於蝶竇。

sentences.english: After the soft breakdown, the leakage current at the low electric field increases irregularly.
sentences.chinese: 軟擊穿後柵介質低場漏電流無規則增大。

sentences.english: The effect of aging voltage on the capacitance and leakage current of al electrolytic capacitors.
sentences.chinese: 老練電壓對鋁電解電容器容量和漏電流的影響。

sentences.english: We should certainly not expect the alternative flow of events to be exhaustive.
sentences.chinese: 我們當然不應該期望另一種事件流是無移漏的。

sentences.english: If not, tell me what I missed.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有，請告訴我我漏了哪些。

sentences.english: The cause of leakage and leakage resistance experiences in Ren456 Well were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了任456井井漏原因及堵漏經驗。

sentences.english: The toilet door to door for wealth, leakage curtilage, usable screen keep out.
sentences.chinese: 廁所門正對大門，爲漏財退運之宅，可用屏風遮擋。

sentences.english: Compared to ureter fistula, stomas fistula occurred earlier with great leaked volume.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘻發生時間相對較早，漏尿量大。

sentences.english: A gap or void in the coating of a pipe or in paint on a metal surface.
sentences.chinese: 在管子覆蓋層或金屬表面塗漆層上有漏塗點或裂縫。

sentences.english: Cracks and leaks are signs of poor construction in a house.
sentences.chinese: 裂縫和漏水錶明房子的施工質量不好。

sentences.english: There were no cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) leaks or delayed hemorrhages .
sentences.chinese: 未出現腦脊液漏或延遲性出血。

sentences.english: The kind of pots to be filled with water can be sealed up and will not leak.
sentences.chinese: 要盛水的那種陶罐，可以密封起來不會漏的。

sentences.english: Love is like an hourglass, with heart filling up as the brain empties.
sentences.chinese: 愛情如砂漏，當腦子倒空時心卻滿滿的。

sentences.english: She drained the water out through a sieve .
Water was leaking from the floor above.
sentences.chinese: 水從上面的地板往下漏。

definition: to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
dew point/(coll.) (of a woman) to expose one of the three areas (nipples and genitals)
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]
to hit the target/(fig.) to hit the nail on the head
variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)
crotch/seat of a pair of trousers
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
